column6: "THE WIDOW," PART 4 (OF 4) The blistering climax to the sexy 4-part Black Widow storyline (just in time for a certain blistering redhead to debut in her own title, elsewhere in Marvel Previews). Who is behind the assassination attempts against the Widow?
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev | letterer:Cory Petit
